channel.title: My blog
channel.description: Blog posts about things that I make and my process. Expect programming, OpenGL, Godot, Python, and maybe other stuff.

item.title: MultiGodot
item.description: An overview of my work in progress multi-user modification of the Godot Game Engine.

item.title: 2D OpenGL Tutorial, Part 1
item.description: The first of a series about making 2D OpenGL applications.

item.title: The First Blog Post!
item.description: Carson's first blog post of all time, the one that probably two people will read!
